ruleSet.name: gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.rules.sponsor.study.test_study_feb_16.cancer_therapy_evaluation_program.sae_reporting_rules
ruleSet.subject: Sponsor defined rules for a study||Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program||Test study Feb 16

metaData.name: Rule-1
metaData.description: Setting Description since its mandatory by JBoss Repository config

readableRule.line: Study is 'Phase I/II Trial' or 'Phase I Trial'
Study Agent IND Holder is 'Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program'
Hospitalization or Prolonged Hospitalization is not 'none'

metaData.description: Setting Description since its mandatory by JBoss Repository config

literal-restriction.display-uri: is greater than or equal to

readableRule.line: Study is 'Phase I/II Trial' or 'Phase I Trial'
Study Agent IND Holder is 'Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program'
